opps a few typos.. i had to retype as it seemed
tbe has a limit on the size of the description :/

The first 2 episodes I didnt think much off but
they seem to get better as the season progress

the first 2 they claimed they let the bad entities into their house as both families played with spirit boards :/

looks like they get a new medium after season 4
to replace one
the first episode also  looks kiek it has interlacing.. I didnt notice at time but i should of use a deinterlacing special filter on converter to try to improve it.. others are better sources though

shame its not online else could get more :)

if anyone is in canada its airing S04 again
